      • uploadDocument

        @PostMapping(value="/upload")
public java.lang.String uploadDocument(@RequestParam(value="patientEmail")
                                                                      java.lang.String patientEmail,
                                                                      @RequestParam(value="file")
                                                                      org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
        Uploads a prescription document for a patient.
        Parameters:
        patientEmail - The email of the patient associated with the prescription.
        file - The MultipartFile containing the prescription document to be uploaded.
        Returns:
        A message indicating the result of the upload.

      • downloadDocument

        @GetMapping(value="/download/{fileName}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.core.io.Resource> downloadDocument(@PathVariable(value="fileName")
                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String fileName)
        Downloads a prescription document based on its file name.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the prescription document to be downloaded.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity containing the prescription document for download.

      • fetchAllFileNames

        @GetMapping(value="/fileNames/{patientEmail}")
public java.util.List<java.lang.String> fetchAllFileNames(@PathVariable(value="patientEmail")
                                                                                                          java.lang.String patientEmail)
        Fetches a list of all prescription file names associated with a patient's email.
        Parameters:
        patientEmail - The email of the patient whose prescription file names are to be fetched.
        Returns:
        A list of prescription file names.
